description:
First, the ball of steel finds himself literally stuck to his arch-nemesis, Miyabi! With Onsokumaru melded to her clothes, the gang is in search of a way to detach him, but it`s starting to look like the only way may be... a Miyabi strip show?!  Then, whe
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Onsokumaru Fica Preso! / II. Shinobu, Joga Bola...!
Onsokumaru Is Stuck / Shinobu Plays Ball
Onsokumaru est coincé / Shinobu joue à fond
Onsokumaru, Kuttsuku no Maki / Shinobu, Playball no Maki
音速丸, くっつくの巻 / 忍, プレイボーるの巻
